mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mall_question (question_idx, user_idx, goods_idx, question_title, question_contents, question_date)VALUES (mall_question_seq.nextval, ${user_idx}, ${goods_idx}, #{question_title}, #{question_contents}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE mall_question SET question_isreplied= 1, question_reply=#{param2}, question_reply_date=sysdate WHERE question_idx=${param1}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, mall_question.* FROM( SELECT * FROM mall_question ORDER BY question_idx ASC ) mall_question) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2} order by question_idx DESC
